thread.title: Gomez, Underwood to perform at American Music Awards
thread.title_full: Gomez, Underwood to perform at American Music Awards

title: Gomez, Underwood to perform at American Music Awards
text:
> Entertainment Gomez, Underwood to perform at American Music Awards FILE - In this Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, file photo, Selena Gomez performs on NBC's "Today" show at Rockefeller Plaza in New York. Gomez, Carrie Underwood and 5 Seconds of Summer will be performing at the American Music Awards, on Nov. 22, 2015, at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles. (Photo by Charles Sykes/Invision/AP, File) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
